text:
@RandPaul Yes! If you're planning to spread a deadly disease and don't care if you murder others, there should be consequences. 

I hope they trace all the future #COVID19 deaths to the "Christian" spreader(s). Families of the deceased should be able to sue #NegligentHomicide #GOPGenocide
